text: Luzula piperi, commonly known as Piper's woodrush is a perennial species of plant in the genus Luzula of the (rush) family Juncaceae. Luzula piperi is native to northwestern North America and eastern Asia ==References== piperi Category:Flora of Western Canada Category:Flora of Alaska Category:Flora of the Western United States Category:Flora of Eastern Asia
title: Luzula piperi
